text: The National 99er Pairs national bridge championship was held at the fall American Contract Bridge League (ACBL) North American Bridge Championship (NABC) until discontinued in 2013. The National 99er Pairs was a one-day two- session matchpoint pairs event, restricted to players with under 100 masterpoints and typically started on the second Friday of the NABC. ==Winners== {| class="sortable wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+Winners of National 99er Pairs |- ! Year !!
